biotools.summary:
A Novel Fusion Decision Predictor for the Identification of 5-Methylcytosine Sites in Genome-Wide DNA Promoters.

This prediction tool was built on the basis of known promoter methylation of human small cell lung cancer cell coefficients. The primary goal was to predict all promoter 5mC sites in human small cell lung cancer cell lines.


This prediction website is based on known human small cell lung cancer cell coefficients based on sites with significant promoter methylation levels. The main goal is to achieve the prediction of all 5mC promoters in human small cell lung cancer cell lines.Experimental data download.
